channel.title: A Couple Of Things I Need Some Help With
channel.description:
[b]Ok well i have a few things i need help with, they are: how to make my client recognise items, how to change max level, how to change the teleportation tabs, how to re-colour and re-name items, how to add walls in and make new areas and if its possible to make a flying area.
All help is greatly appreciated. Thanks.
~ RaZoR36[/b]

item.title: A Couple Of Things I Need Some Help With
item.dc:creator: @claber_guy claber guy
item.description:
@claber_guy wrote:

i think this is max level

[code] }

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
		int points = 0;
		int output = 0;

		for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 100; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
    		return lvl;
		}
		}
		return 100;

}[/code]

change the 100/99 to whatever level you want,

im not sure if this is right

Read full topic
